metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8878 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
KDE KMail does not encrypt attachments in emails when "automaticencryption" is enabled, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation by sniffing the network.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8878` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
